 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָמַר‎</span> **verb** ==bristle up== ([[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 106</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***contract***; in that case <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפַּחְדְּךָ בְשָׂרִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Ps.119.20|Ps 119:20]] ***from fear of thee did my flesh bristle up***, 'creep.' **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּסַמֵּר שַׂעֲרַת בְּשָׂרִי‎</span> [[Job.4.15|Job 4:15]].
